mapper.select: select * from file_info where file_type =#{file_type} and parent_seq =#{parent_seq}
mapper.insert: insert into file_info (file_seq, file_type, member_email, sysname, oriname, parent_seq, upload_at) values (file_seq.nextval, #{file_type}, #{member_email}, #{sysname}, #{oriname}, #{parent_seq}, sysdate)
mapper.delete: delete from file_info where parent_seq=#{parent_seq} and file_type=#{file_type}
